Vovsoft Disk Monitor Gadget is a lightweight Windows utility that helps you monitor your disk space usage in real-time. Features include user defined colors and transparency.

Vovsoft Disk Monitor Gadget is a lightweight Windows utility that helps you monitor your disk space usage in real-time. Features include user defined colors and transparency. Compact tool with tiny footprint.

It provides a quick and easy way to see the free space available on all your drives, including:
- HDDs (Hard Disk Drives)
- SSDs (Solid State Drives)
- Flash disks (USB drives)
- Network drives

At a glance, you can see:
- Drive letters: Easily identify each drive.
- Drive names: Recognize specific drives for better organization.
- Free space ratio: Get a clear understanding of how much space is used on each drive, displayed as a percentage.

Displayed as a hint:
- Used size (GB)
- Free size (GB)
- Total size (GB)
